name: Crystal Caverns (itch) (Elanoria)
description: Welcome to Crystal Caverns! You have gotten Lost! Venture through this small and dangerous cavern. Use crystals that you collect to defeat enemies of the same color. R is Red, G is Green, and B is Blue. W is forward. A and D are turning. This is a very unique dungeon crawler! P.S- I worked too hard on the graphics so let that make up for the gameplay please.
